text: receive an invite for a meeting and you
don't have Amazon chime this video shows
you how to join the call if you don't
have the Amazon chime app installed from
the meeting invite you can join using
the provided dialing number and meeting
ID or choose the join link to join the
meeting with your browser or to launch
the meeting with the Amazon chime
downloadable app this opens up a new
browser tab Amazon chime validates your
meeting ID and if valid and not locked
will prompt you for the name you would
like displayed on the roster if you have
an Amazon chime account you can also
choose to sign in once complete choose
next
Amazon chime asks you to choose the
meeting audio you would like to use if
you want to use your computer's mic and
speakers you'll be prompted to allow
your browser access to your microphone
before you join the meeting then you'll
be added to the meeting
Amazon chime also provides an option to
have Amazon chime call you at a number
you provide this feature is available if
the organizers administrator has enabled
it by selecting call me at a telephone
number
Amazon chime will call the phone number
and connect you to the meeting
you
after adding the phone number you can
ask it to remember the number select
dial and you'll receive a phone call at
the number provided you will be prompted
to press five to confirm you want to
join the meeting
you can also manually dial in with the
meeting pin if you select this option
the dial in information is displayed if
you need international numbers use the
drop-down menu to select your country a
list of international toll and toll-free
numbers are provided when you dial in
you will be prompted to enter the
meeting pin next choose done
if you are in a shared room and your
computer is not providing the main audio
connection you can select the final
option and avoid audio feedback within
the room you will be added to the
meeting and can view the meeting
attendees the Amazon chime web app
offers many features during the meeting
including a meeting roster meeting chat
and meeting controls when someone in the
meeting shares their screen it is
displayed
there are downloadable clients available
in Amazon chime that provide the most
consistent experience for video screen
sharing Remote Desktop Control and other
features on supported operating systems
to install Amazon chime download the app
for your device you'll be guided through
your device specific process for
installing an app here's the process on
a Windows laptop
after the app is installed follow the
steps to join your meeting if you don't
have an Amazon chime account you can
still join the meeting once you have
installed Amazon chime you can choose
open Amazon chime
the app is opened and you're connected
to the meeting other videos in this
video series provide specifics on how to
use the Amazon chime app meeting
features and that's how you join
meetings without having the Amazon chime

enjoy your call
